newsitem.title: USA: LPC - DKB, Scotia lead $150 mln Electronic Arts loan.
newsitem.headline: LPC - DKB, Scotia lead $150 mln Electronic Arts loan.

text.p: NEW YORK, Jan 15 (LPC) - Agent and arranger Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank LTD (DKB) and documentation agent Bank of Nova Scotia on January 10 began syndicating a $150 million "synthetic lease" credit facility for Electronic Arts Inc, banking sources said.

Pricing on the three-year renewable revolver/ letter-of-credit facility starts at 46.25 basis points over the London Interbank Offered Rate (LIBOR), with a 17.5 basis point facility fee, bankers said..
The pricing grid is tied to the borrower's ratio of debt to tangible net worth, they said.
Lenders who participated in an existing $35 million loan, also put in place by DBK, have been solicitate, and commitments are due at the end of next week, market sources said.
DKB has committed $39.5 million, and Bank of Nova Scotia has committed $30 million, sources said.
EA will use the financing to construct and lease its new corporate headquarters, bankers said.
